question:
Which of the following awards is / are given to the writers of only those languages which are included in Eighth Schedule of Constitution of India?
  1. Sahitya Akademi Award
  2. Saraswati Samman
  3. Vyas Samman
  4. Jnanpith Award
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Sahitya Akademi Award is conferred on writers of outstanding works in one of the following twenty-four major Indian languages. The Saraswati Samman Â is an annual award for outstanding prose or poetry literary works in any Indian language listed in Schedule VIII of the Constitution of India. Vyas Samman is for Hindi Writers The Jnanpith Award, instituted on May 22, 1961, is given for the best creative literary writing by any Indian citizen in any of the languages included in the VIII Schedule of the Indian Constitution.
